item.title: Top GOP rebel angles for powerful House leadership-backed committee post
item.description: Rep. Chip Roy is floating himself as a possible candidate to chair the influential House Rules Committee next year.

item.title: Legislators across political spectrum ‘equally angry’ over handling of drone sightings: New Jersey lawmaker
item.description: New Jersey State Assemblyman Paul Kanitra described the government's handling of the weekslong drone sightings across the northeast as “infuriating."
